answers.answer: Hi.Have you ruled out Diabetes ? It is a common cause for peripheral neuropathy which can produce similar symptoms. A negative EMG does not rule out neuropathy.Regards

question: I have numbness in my hand or hands at night . I now use just one pillow trying not to pinch any nerves. This has been going on for about a month.I also have throbbing pain in my feet every day after standing . I now limit my standing activities and wear breathable crocs or tennis shoes. I have had this condition for about 4 years and it is getting worse. It started with tingling in the feet and now my feet throb and feel swollen.I have had a needle electromygraphy 3-9-06 which was negative.Can the hands and feet issues be related ?Could this be a vascular problem ?
title: Hand numbness and Feet pain
